segments.text: I see a kitchen scene, quite typical in many ways.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: An adult woman is standing at the sink, diligently drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But wait, something isn't quite right with the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is absolutely overflowing, water pouring over the front edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It forms a continuous sheet, cascading onto the cabinets and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She must surely feel her foot getting soaked in that growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so completely unaware of such an obvious mess?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water just keeps running, making a wider and wider pool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a shocking sight, the sheer volume of water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't looked down or even registered the splash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could cause some serious damage to the floor and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical how absorbed she is in that single plate.
segments.speaker: PAR
